notice.title: Welcome!
notice.description: Welcome to BoincTasks Js, we hope you enjoy using it. BoincTasks Js is free and open source, written in Javascript. It runs on Linux, Mac and Windows. If you encounter a problem, submit a request or report a problem or bug on our GitHub page. Or visit our forum . Although BoincTasks Js is free, it costs money to keep things running, so please consider donating.
